comments.body: Widget classes should usually start with a `Key key` named parameter that's passed along via `super(key: key)`
Eventually we'll have to explain when it's safe to call this (not at build time).
At build time you wouldn't have a `context`, so is that enough discouragement from calling this at the wrong time?

At `build(BuildContext context) ` time is exactly when you might be tempted to call it. 

At the moment this is just a private entry point within a demo. No need to worry about this yet.
Oh I see what you mean!  I'll add a TODO so I remember this later.
